Class YHttpServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.yawlfoundation.yawl.engine.interfce.YHttpServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentStore, InterfaceA_EngineBasedServer, InterfaceB_EngineBasedServer, LoadBalancerServlet, Reporter, ResourceGateway, WorkletGateway

    public class YHttpServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    An override of HttpServlet to include a few useful generic methods
    Author:
    Michael Adams
